string.text: UNEXPECTED ENCOUNTER
Find out where Mishgan went
God damn, got knocked over the head real bad... Seems like the idiot was planning to save his friends in the vehicle graveyard by himself. I need to check it out so things don't go south.
TRADER FROM THE GARBAGE
Find work in the stalker base
According to Mishgan, the nearest stalker camp is located in the hangar. I should head over there and ask the local trader for work.
What do I do next? I think I'll find the nearest stalker camp and ask their trader for work.
Wait until Crutch is free
Shooter asked me to wait until the trader has a free moment. Might as well go take a walk in the meantime. Someone might have work for me.
Talk to Crutch
The trader must have dealt with his matters while I was looking around.
PRISONERS
Distract the bandits
I need to distract the bandits somehow while Mishgan approaches them from behind.
Finish off the bandits
A few scumbags are left. Chances are they're the ones looking after the prisoners.
Talk to Mishgan
Things got real hot. Time to talk to Mishgan.
Fight off the bandit wave or run away
Damn it, bandit reinforcements are coming in! I need to deal with them.
TAKE A LOOK AROUND
Take a look around while the trader is busy
I'll go take a walk while the trader is busy. Maybe I'll find something of use.
Forest
I'll go take a walk while the trader is busy. Maybe I'll find something of use. Wouldn't hurt to check out the small forest nearby at the outskirts.
Flea market
I'll go take a walk while the trader is busy. Maybe I'll find something of use. Judging by the map, it seems there's some sort of ruins located near the hangar. Might be a good place to check.
Duty outpost

I'll go take a walk while the trader is busy. Maybe I'll find something of use. I heard a faction named Duty has set up one of their checkpoints here. I haven't met them yet personally, so might be a good time do that and maybe ask for a job in the process too.
DESERTER
Lead the deserter to Yurok
I decided to arrange a job for Yurok. The soldier promised me good coin.
SECRET OF DYATLOV'S OUTPOST
Talk to the outpost commander
The commander of the Duty outpost told me that something strange is happening in his camp. He asked me to come over when I have the time.
Survey the camp after 12 a.m.
Something inexplicable is happening in the Duty outpost. I'll do what I can to deal with it.
Talk to the commander
This might be the Zone, but I never imagined something like that to be possible! There's definitely something strange happening in the outpost, and I need to inform the commander of this.
Question the stalkers about activities at night
The key to solving the mystery is information. I need to ask the locals — they might know more about what's going on.
Find a stalker named Corvalol
Corvalol might be able to help solve the mystery in the Duty outpost. According to the stalker I questioned, he's hunting artifacts in the meadow by the flea market.
Find the Duty member

Someone in Duty is seeing to it that stalkers don't skulk around in search of the truth, and I should find out who this "someone" is. Being that I'm working under the commander, he won't be able to make any threats to me, leaving me to find him myself. Dyatlov should have something to tell me about this.
Talk to Averyanov
I should talk to the last person who witnessed the Duty member disappear. I'm not sure how this will help with investigating the mystery, but it's worth a try.
Go to the site of Galushkin's disappearance

Averyanov turned out very quick-tempered and jumpy, and I don't believe he's usually like that. He's probably hiding something, and I'm sure that he's the one who threatened Carvalol. I'll go to the forest and have a look around at the area where Galushkin disappeared.
Tell the commander about the recent events
The missing Duty member was lying in the bottom of a well — he was killed by his own associates! They sure weren't happy over his promotion. I should tell Dyatlov about all this.
Catch up with Averyanov
Averyanov left the outpost, but judging by his PDA signals, he's still at the Garbage. I'm going to catch up with him.
Go to the forest
Averyanov went into the forest. I should catch up with him.
Report to Dyatlov about Averyanov's disappearance
Justice is served and Averyanov is gone for good. I need to report to the outpost commander about this.
Report to Dyatlov about Averyanov's death
Everything is taken care of. Now just to report to Dyatlov.
HELP DUTY
Deal with the bandits on the farm
Dyatlov asked me to remove the bandits on the farm near the forest. This might put me in higher standing within his faction.
Report to Dyatlov
Time to report to the outpost commander that he can send his people to the farm.
TUNNEL IN THE GARBAGE
Deal with the bandits
Bandits have settled in the railway tunnel at the Garbage. I must deal with them.
Return to collect reward
Everything is taken care of. Time to collect my reward.
LOCAL DOCTOR
Meet Gamzat
Some medic named Gamzat may provide me with work, judging by what Crutch told me. I should meet with him. I hope I won't have to empty bedpans for the ill.
DANGEROUS EXPEDITION
Talk to Gamzat about the task
Gamzat needs help with something difficult and very dangerous. The pay, though, is quite appropriate.
Lure the bloodsucker to Gamzat
I need to carefully lure the bloodsucker to Gamzat for him to take it down.
WOUND
Heal up

After a thrashing like that, I need to come to my senses. What's the absolute best way to lift your spirits? Spending money, of course! And I just happen to have some. I'll go to the trader and help myself to some new equipment.
DARK VALLEY
Go to Dark Valley for the artifacts
Ahead of me are new places I've never been to before! I'll grab the trader's case and, while I'm at it, learn more about the valley's surroundings and search for loot.
Grab the artifact case from the bandit leader
Crutch asked me to rush to the Dark Valley for a case that's held by the bandit leader.
Wait for Crutch to appear and hand him the case
Crutch went off somewhere away from the Garbage and told me he'll send a message when he comes back.
MESSENGER
Meet Myslav
Shooter sent me to meet with a comrade of his, Myslav. I need to discuss our deal with him.
TEMPTING OFFER
Talk to Shooter
Shooter's got some offer for me.
SEARCH FOR THE CODE
Meet the stalkers

Myslav informed about three of his former digger acquaintances. Perhaps one of them knows the code to the save. According to Myslav, the first one — Tail — is somewhere in the Garbage, while Mitay and Barin are at Agroprom and the Cordon, respectively.

Through the information on Myslav's body, I found out that three of his acquaintances were formerly part of the diggers, who are based in Agroprom with some recent loot, the case. Perhaps one of these stalkers knows the code to the safe that holds the case. His first acquaintance — Tail — is somewhere in the Garbage, while Mitay and Barin are at Agroprom and the Cordon, respectively.
DEAD MESSENGER
Search Myslav's body
Shooter sent me to talk to a Myslav, but he is dead. I should search his body for information about our business.
DUTY OUTPOST
Meet the unit commander
These Duty guys are quite intriguing. I should talk to them and see if I can find out something new, or get some work.
RETURN
Hand over the case to Crutch
My trip to the Dark Valley was not an easy one... but I have the case. Time to hand it over to the trader and receive my reward.
MUTANT OVERLORD
Talk to Gamzat
Gamzat asked me to come see him once I'm done with my own matters. We'll see what the bloodsucker hunter has in mind.
Reach Gamzat's shelter
Gamzat has some new work for me. He says nobody will have to run away from mutants anymore. I should meet him in his shelter.
Go to the meadow with blind dogs
Gamzat explained his observations on suppressing the aggressive actions of mutants by using an artifact. We'll put it to the test on dogs.
Fight off the mutants
The artifact had no effect. We'll have to engage the mutants.
Talk to Gamzat
Looks like we fought them off... Time to have a talk.
Grab the notes in Gamzat's shelter
In his last dying words Gamzat asked me to hand over his notes to Dubinin in the science facility at Agroprom. I need to get them from his shelter.
Kill the bloodsucker or leave it alive
I need to kill the bloodsucker while the artifact is still active. Otherwise, it could pose a threat to the nearby camp.
Take the documents to the science facility
Gamzat is dead... His experiments weren't entirely successful. I'll take his notes to the science facility at Agroprom, just as I promised.
Meet with Dubinin
I was contacted by Dubinin. I need to find him near the facility.
NEW MEDIC
Go see Sanya
Sanya made it to the stalker base after all. I should meet him and ask how he settled in.
REQUEST
Get medical products from Duty
The new medic is in need of medical products. I could try asking Duty — they might have surplus supplies for sale.
Clear the area of mutants
Duty promised to share medical products in exchange for me clearing out the nearby boars.
Return to Dyatlov
Boars eliminated. I can return to Dyatlov for my reward.
Take the medical products to Sanya
Surprisingly, Duty did provide me with medical products. Time to take them to Sanya.
BAR
Visit new surroundings

Now, after helping Dyatlov's unit, I have access to the biggest stalker haven in the Zone: the legendary Bar. It is under Duty's control — as such, visitors are expected to behave in an acceptable manner. As I'm told, it's a good place for unwinding and finding extra work.
TO THE ARMY WAREHOUSES
Get to the Bar

Information from Koval suggests that certain individuals similar to those who were seen at Agroprom on the day the professor disappeared were spotted at the Army Warehouses. Time will tell whether this info checks out, but at this time, it's my only lead. The way to the warehouses is through the Bar — I'll need to be very careful there.
Get past the Bar
I'll have to act carefully and not draw any attention in the Bar. The army isn't well-regarded here at all.
SPECIAL ORDER
Wait until the goods arrive
I need to wait until Vitka Stepak gets the goods. Estimated time of arrival:
24 hours.
48 hours
Ordered:
Pick up goods
Vitka Stepak messaged me about the delivery of the goods. Time to pick up:
